pw:item.pw:title: A fine quotation is a diamond on the finger of a

pw:body.p: A fine quotation is a diamond on the finger of a man of wit, and a pebble in the hand of a fool.

pw:item.pw:title: A friend is someone who knows all about you and

pw:body.p: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and and still likes you."

pw:item.pw:title: A great many people think they are thinking when

pw:body.p: "A great many people think they are thinking when they are really rearranging their prejudices."

pw:item.pw:title: Adventure is just bad planning.

pw:body.p: "Adventure is just bad planning."

pw:item.pw:title: All you need in this life is ignorance and

pw:body.p: "All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then success is sure."

pw:item.pw:title: Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense

pw:body.p: Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense enough to be lazy

pw:item.pw:title: Ambition is the last refuge of failure.

pw:body.p: "Ambition is the last refuge of failure."

pw:item.pw:title: An intellectual is a person who has discovered

pw:body.p: "An intellectual is a person who has discovered something more interesting than sex."

pw:item.pw:title: An intellectual is a person who has discovered2

pw:body.p: An intellectual is a person who has discovered something more interesting than sex.

pw:item.pw:title: Any fool can criticize, condemn

pw:body.p: "Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain - and most fools do."

pw:item.pw:title: Better to remain silent and be thought a fool

pw:body.p: "Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt."

pw:item.pw:title: Conversation enriches the understanding

pw:body.p: "Conversation enriches the understanding; but solitude is the school of genius."

pw:item.pw:title: Criticism is prejudice made plausible.

pw:body.p: "Criticism is prejudice made plausible."

pw:item.pw:title: Education is a progressive discovery of our own

pw:body.p: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.

pw:item.pw:title: Everyone is entitled to be stupid

pw:body.p: "Everyone is entitled to be stupid, but some abuse the privilege."

pw:item.pw:title: Give a man a match, and he'll be warm for a

pw:body.p: "Give a man a match, and he'll be warm for a minute, but set him on fire, and he'll be warm for the rest of his life."

pw:item.pw:title: Glory is fleeting, but obscurity is forever.

pw:body.p: "Glory is fleeting, but obscurity is forever."

pw:item.pw:title: He who asks is a fool for five minutes

pw:body.p: "He who asks is a fool for five minutes; he who does not ask remains a fool forever."

pw:item.pw:title: His lack of education is more than compensated

pw:body.p: His lack of education is more than compensated for by his keenly developed moral bankruptcy.

pw:item.pw:title: I cannot believe that the purpose of life is to

pw:body.p: "I cannot believe that the purpose of life is to be happy. I think the purpose of life is to be useful, to be responsible, to be compassionate. It is, above all to matter, to count, to stand for something, to have made some difference that you lived at all."

pw:item.pw:title: I swore never to be silent whenever and wherever

pw:body.p: "I swore never to be silent whenever and wherever human beings endure suffering and humiliation. We must always take sides. Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim. Silence encourages the tormentor, never the tormented. "

pw:item.pw:title: Idleness is not doing nothing

pw:body.p: "Idleness is not doing nothing. Idleness is being free to do anything."

pw:item.pw:title: If you think about what you ought to do for other

pw:body.p: "If you think about what you ought to do for other people, your character will take care of itself."

pw:item.pw:title: If you want others to be happy

pw:body.p: "If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion."

pw:item.pw:title: If you want to get laid, go to college

pw:body.p: "If you want to get laid, go to college, but if you want an education, go to the library."

pw:item.pw:title: It is better to remain silent and be thought a

pw:body.p: It is better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to open one’s mouth and remove all doubt.

pw:item.pw:title: It is not a bad idea to get in the habit of

pw:body.p: "It is not a bad idea to get in the habit of writing down one's thoughts. It saves one having to bother anyone else with them."

pw:item.pw:title: It is poor civic hygiene to install technologies

pw:body.p: "It is poor civic hygiene to install technologies that could someday facilitate a police state."

pw:item.pw:title: It is said that power corrupts

pw:body.p: "It is said that power corrupts, but actually it's more true that power attracts the corruptible. The sane are usually attracted by other things than power."

pw:item.pw:title: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to

pw:body.p: "It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it."

pw:item.pw:title: It often takes more courage to change one’s

pw:body.p: "It often takes more courage to change one’s opinion than to stick to it."

pw:item.pw:title: It seems that perfection is reached not when

pw:body.p: "It seems that perfection is reached not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away."

pw:item.pw:title: Knowing others is intelligence

pw:body.p: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.

pw:item.pw:title: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of

pw:body.p: "Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired."

pw:item.pw:title: Most conversations are simply monologues

pw:body.p: Most conversations are simply monologues delivered in the presence of witnesses.

pw:item.pw:title: Only small minds want always to be right.

pw:body.p: "Only small minds want always to be right."

pw:item.pw:title: Only the mediocre are always at their best.

pw:body.p: "Only the mediocre are always at their best."

pw:item.pw:title: Patriotism is your conviction that this country

pw:body.p: Patriotism is your conviction that this country is superior to all other countries because you were born in it.

pw:item.pw:title: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation

pw:body.p: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use.

pw:item.pw:title: Programming is for folks who are thrilled when a

pw:body.p: Programming is for folks who are thrilled when a computer reminds them they're missing a bracket or a semicolon.

pw:item.pw:title: Punctuality is the virtue of the bored.

pw:body.p: Punctuality is the virtue of the bored.

pw:item.pw:title: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the

pw:body.p: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.

pw:item.pw:title: Rudeness is a weak man's imitation of strength.

pw:body.p: "Rudeness is a weak man's imitation of strength."

pw:item.pw:title: Sanity is a madness put to good use.

pw:body.p: Sanity is a madness put to good use.

pw:item.pw:title: Silence is the virtue of fools.

pw:body.p: "Silence is the virtue of fools."

pw:item.pw:title: Statistics are like bikinis

pw:body.p: "Statistics are like bikinis. What they reveal is suggestive, but what they conceal is vital."

pw:item.pw:title: Strange as it seems, no amount of learning can

pw:body.p: "Strange as it seems, no amount of learning can cure stupidity, and higher education positively fortifies it."

pw:item.pw:title: Stupidity is like entropy: it always increases

pw:body.p: "Stupidity is like entropy: it always increases and you have to do work to get rid of it."

pw:item.pw:title: Success is getting what you want

pw:body.p: "Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get."

pw:item.pw:title: The best way to win an argument is to begin by

pw:body.p: "The best way to win an argument is to begin by being right."

pw:item.pw:title: The greatest challenge to any thinker is stating

pw:body.p: The greatest challenge to any thinker is stating the problem in a way that will allow a solution.

pw:item.pw:title: The greatest of all freedoms is that of

pw:body.p: "The greatest of all freedoms is that of nonparticipation. When you stop applauding on cue, you are reborn—free."

pw:item.pw:title: The height of cleverness is to be able to conceal

pw:body.p: The height of cleverness is to be able to conceal it

pw:item.pw:title: The more you know the less you need to say.

pw:body.p: "The more you know the less you need to say."

pw:item.pw:title: The nice part about being a pessimist is that you

pw:body.p: The nice part about being a pessimist is that you are constantly being either proven right or pleasantly surprised.

pw:item.pw:title: The only reason some people get lost in thought

pw:body.p: "The only reason some people get lost in thought is because it's unfamiliar territory."

pw:item.pw:title: The only reason some people get lost in thought2

pw:body.p: The only reason some people get lost in thought is because it's unfamiliar territory.

pw:item.pw:title: The power of accurate observation is commonly

pw:body.p: The power of accurate observation is commonly called cynicism by those who have not got it.

pw:item.pw:title: The secret of eternal youth is arrested

pw:body.p: "The secret of eternal youth is arrested development."

pw:item.pw:title: The secret of eternal youth is arrested2

pw:body.p: The secret of eternal youth is arrested development.

pw:item.pw:title: The stupid neither forgive nor forget

pw:body.p: "The stupid neither forgive nor forget; the naive forgive and forget; the wise forgive but do not forget."

pw:item.pw:title: The surest way to corrupt the youth is to

pw:body.p: "The surest way to corrupt the youth is to instruct him to hold in higher regard those who think alike than those who think differently."

pw:item.pw:title: The truth is that many people set rules to keep

pw:body.p: The truth is that many people set rules to keep from making decisions.

pw:item.pw:title: The whole dream of democracy is to raise the

pw:body.p: The whole dream of democracy is to raise the proletarian to the level of stupidity attained by the bourgeois.

pw:item.pw:title: There is no such thing as public opinion

pw:body.p: "There is no such thing as public opinion. There is only published opinion"

pw:item.pw:title: There's a fine line between fishing and just

pw:body.p: There's a fine line between fishing and just standing on the shore like an idiot.

pw:item.pw:title: Those who stand for nothing fall for anything.

pw:body.p: Those who stand for nothing fall for anything.

pw:item.pw:title: To repeat what others have said

pw:body.p: "To repeat what others have said, requires education; to challenge it, requires brains."

pw:item.pw:title: True friendship comes when the silence between

pw:body.p: "True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable."

pw:item.pw:title: True wisdom is less presuming than folly

pw:body.p: "True wisdom is less presuming than folly. The wise man doubteth often and changeth his mind; the fool is obstinate and doubteth not; he knowth all things but his own ignorance."

pw:item.pw:title: Typos are very important to all written form

pw:body.p: "Typos are very important to all written form. It gives the reader something to look for so they aren't distracted by the total lack of content in your writing."

pw:item.pw:title: Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent.

pw:body.p: "Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent."

pw:item.pw:title: Wise men speak because they have something to say

pw:body.p: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.

pw:item.pw:title: Wit is educated insolence.

pw:body.p: Wit is educated insolence.

pw:item.pw:title: Women should be obscene and not heard.

pw:body.p: "Women should be obscene and not heard."

pw:item.pw:title: Work is the refuge of people who have nothing

pw:body.p: Work is the refuge of people who have nothing better to do.
